summary: REQ-1 appears to be implemented: the FAQ item titled “What are the terms and conditions?” is described as removed from the Terms & Conditions section on the /faqs page. No other explicit BuildRequest requirements are evident as missing from the provided diff summary. However, there are modifications to tracking/summary files that were not requested by the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated/added descriptive project metadata and feature request tracking unrelated to the requested FAQ removal (e.g., marking new_feature_requests, pending statuses, and broader project summary).
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only asks to remove a specific FAQ entry; it does not request changes to project tracking metadata.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated repository-wide frontend file summary text beyond the specific FAQ removal (includes many unrelated feature descriptions such as SitePublishGate, offline page, SEO tags, Stripe hook fixes, etc.).
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only requests removing one FAQ item; it does not request updating a global file summary document or documenting unrelated features.
